body: So my birthday, July 2, is coming up. Im not sure if i should buy another minecraft account or GOLD rank....What do you guys think is the better option? :D
body_tagged: So my birthday, July 2, is coming up. Im not sure if i should buy another minecraft account or GOLD rank....What do you guys think is the better option? :D
title: What Shall I Get?

replies.body: I'd go for Gold. Having an alt seems much greater than it is.
replies.body_tagged: I'd go for Gold. Having an alt seems much greater than it is.

replies.body: If i get GOLD, my sis and bro will also be using the kits and such.... and may run a risk of one of them spawn camping cuz they think theyre doing so good.... but  an alt has cons too.....
replies.body_tagged: If i get GOLD, my sis and bro will also be using the kits and such.... and may run a risk of one of them spawn camping cuz they think theyre doing so good.... but  an alt has cons too.....

replies.body: If you share your account with your sister and brother then you should get a new account so they don't get you banned.
replies.body_tagged: If you share your account with your sister and brother then you should get a new account so they don't get you banned.

replies.body:
If you want to support the server, then donate and get gold :)

If you buy another MC account,  you donate to MC which helps run the game, which helps run Avicus, which techinacally supports Avicus.


Win Win bro :)
replies.body_tagged:
If you want to support the server, then donate and get gold :)

If you buy another MC account,  you donate to MC which helps run the game, which helps run Avicus, which techinacally supports Avicus.


Win Win bro :)

replies.body: I would get Gold and tell your brothers and sisters not to play on this server or have to be supervised while playing :3
replies.body_tagged: I would get Gold and tell your brothers and sisters not to play on this server or have to be supervised while playing :3

replies.body: Well....actually my bro discovered mczone. If i tell him he cant play it, he gonna rage and tell me its his server....lol. So far, i feel like getting an alt <3

Why not get gold and an alt... To me JK

replies.body: If you have other people playing on your account, I strongly recommend getting an alt.
replies.body_tagged: If you have other people playing on your account, I strongly recommend getting an alt.
